title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry recipe with a mix of colorful veggies.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add garlic, and stir fry vegetables. Season with soy sauce.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A delicious and spicy chicken curry cooked with aromatic spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken, sauté onions, add spices and cook till tender.

title: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy and cheesy Alfredo pasta that's perfect for a quick dinner.
instructions: Cook pasta, prepare Alfredo sauce with cream and cheese, and mix.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: A simple grilled salmon recipe with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season salmon, grill until cooked, and serve with lemon wedges.

title: Vegetable Soup
description: A hearty and comforting vegetable soup with a mix of fresh vegetables.
instructions: Boil vegetables with stock, add seasoning, and simmer until cooked.

title: Beef Stew
description: Tender chunks of beef slow-cooked with vegetables in a rich broth.
instructions: Brown beef, add vegetables and stock, and cook on low heat.

title: Chilli Gobi
description: A spicy and tangy Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower tossed in a flavorful sauce.
instructions: Fry cauliflower florets, prepare a sauce with soy sauce, chili sauce, and garlic, and toss the fried cauliflower in the sauce.

title: Vegetable Biryani
description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish made with mixed vegetables and spices.
instructions: Cook rice and vegetables separately, then layer with spices.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp cooked in garlic butter sauce and served with pasta.
instructions: Sauté shrimp in garlic butter, mix with pasta, and serve.

title: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer chunks grilled to perfection with spices.
instructions: Marinate paneer, skewer, and grill until golden.

title: Tandoori Chicken
description: Spicy and flavorful chicken marinated in yogurt and cooked in a tandoor.
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook in tandoor or oven until tender.

title: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad with crispy lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Toss lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan with dressing.

title: Fish Tacos
description: Fresh fish fillets in soft tortillas with tangy toppings.
instructions: Cook fish, assemble tacos with toppings, and serve.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with a flavorful mixture of rice and veggies.
instructions: Stuff bell peppers with mixture, bake until tender.

title: Lamb Chops
description: Juicy lamb chops marinated in herbs and grilled to perfection.
instructions: Marinate lamb chops, grill until cooked.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms and Parmesan.
instructions: Cook rice with stock and mushrooms, stir in cheese.

title: Barbecue Ribs
description: Tender and smoky ribs slathered in barbecue sauce.
instructions: Slow-cook ribs, apply barbecue sauce, and grill.

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel wrapped in flatbread with fresh veggies and sauce.
instructions: Prepare falafel, wrap in bread with veggies and sauce.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of eggplant, marinara, and cheese baked to perfection.
instructions: Layer eggplant with sauce and cheese, bake.

title: Beef Tacos
description: Classic beef tacos with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning, assemble tacos, and serve.

title: Classic Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Creamy and smooth vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans.
instructions: Mix milk, cream, and vanilla. Churn in an ice cream maker and freeze until set.

title: Chocolate Fudge Ice Cream
description: Rich and decadent chocolate ice cream with a fudge swirl.
instructions: Prepare a chocolate base, churn, and swirl in fudge sauce before freezing.

title: Strawberry Ice Cream
description: Refreshing strawberry ice cream made with fresh strawberries.
instructions: Puree strawberries, mix with cream and sugar, churn, and freeze.

title: Mango Sorbet
description: A tropical mango sorbet that's light and refreshing.
instructions: Blend mangoes with sugar and lime juice, freeze, and churn until smooth.
